name: Maniac in the Woods
description:
You wake up in the middle of the woods, with no idea where. You must escape. 

  • Right Mouse Button: Turn on the flashlight.
  • Key E: Pick up items.
  • Key ESC (ESCAPE): Pause.
  • Key WASD: Walk.
  • Key SHIFT:  Run.

Please put any criticism in the comments because this is my first 3D game.
